description: Microsoft Outlook 2007, Microsoft Outlook 2010 and Microsoft Outlook 2013 allow a remote code execution vulnerability due to the way email messages are parsed, aka "Microsoft Outlook Remote Code Execution Vulnerability". This CVE is unique from CVE-2018-0791.

enisaIdProduct.product_version: Microsoft Outlook 2007, Microsoft Outlook 2010 and Microsoft Outlook 2013
